alert.note: Alert for Dickens; Kent (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 05 at 1:31PM CDT until April 05 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected for the remainder of this afternoon and early evening. Later tonight, north winds from 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Dickens and Kent Counties. * WHEN...For the current Wind Advisory, it remains in effect until 8 PM CDT tonight. For the second Wind Advisory, in effect from 11 PM tonight until 4 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds, with patchy blowing dust, will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
